context.p: On the Delete organization page, you can permanently delete an organization account. The following prerequisites must be fulfilled:

ul.li: The period defined by the ORGANIZATION_RETIRE_PERIOD configuration parameter has expired.

The administrator of the organization to be deleted has requested this deletion (he has removed the organization already, but the data is still kept for the period defined by the ORGANIZATION_RETIRE_PERIOD configuration parameter).

step.cmd: Select the organization to delete by clicking the corresponding check box.

info.p: Check boxes are inactive as long as the ORGANIZATION_RETIRE_PERIOD has not expired.

result.p: The email address and the user ID of the organization's administrator who removed the organization are deleted as well as all business-related data of the organization.
